hero.title: Building the Future of AI, Together
hero.description: NovaAI was founded with a simple mission: to make transformative AI accessible to every organization. We combine world-class expertise with a genuine passion for helping businesses succeed.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: NovaAI began in 2020 when a group of AI researchers and engineers saw an opportunity to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and practical business applications.
story.p2: What started as a small consulting practice has grown into a full-service AI agency serving clients across industries—from Fortune 500 enterprises to innovative startups.
story.p3: Today, our solutions power millions of interactions daily, helping organizations automate processes, gain insights, and create experiences that were previously impossible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? We're happy to help.

items.q: How long does a typical AI project take?
items.a: Project timelines vary based on complexity, but most engagements range from 8-16 weeks for initial deployment. We focus on delivering value incrementally, so you'll see results throughout the process, not just at the end.

items.q: What industries do you work with?
items.a: We work across industries including financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, retail, logistics, and technology. Our team has deep expertise in applying AI to diverse business challenges.

items.q: Do you work with existing AI systems or only build new ones?
items.a: Both. We're equally comfortable building new AI solutions from scratch or optimizing and extending your existing systems. Our AI Audit service is specifically designed to help you get more from current investments.

items.q: How do you handle data security and privacy?
items.a: Security is foundational to everything we do. We follow industry best practices, implement role-based access controls, and can work within your existing security frameworks. We're experienced with HIPAA, SOC 2, GDPR, and other compliance requirements.

items.q: What does the engagement process look like?
items.a: We start with a discovery phase to understand your needs, followed by a detailed proposal. Once aligned, we work in agile sprints with regular check-ins. You'll have direct access to our team throughout the engagement.
